channel.title: Items on ground always on server that respawn?
channel.description: i remember in rs where there would be spots that coins would spawn on the ground and after you picked them up they would respawn every like minute or so, also zamorak wines worked the same way. how would i add items and make them respawn on ground like that? for a 317 pi, dont have to spoon feed me just guide me in the right direction please, thanks

item.title: Items on ground always on server that respawn?
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

Arcik:

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/279703-project-insanity-global-drops-handler.html#post2389481

source\server\world\GlobalDropsHandler.java:58: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.world.GlobalDropsHandler CycleEventHandler.getSingleton().addEvent(c, new CycleEvent() { ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

i get this error after following that tutorial and i am stuck ive tried several different things but nothing is working, anyone know how to fix this?

Read full topic

item.source: Items on ground always on server that respawn?

item.title: Items on ground always on server that respawn?
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

Loveandpower:

look in your itemhandler and it probably has to do with a specific packet…such as ground item or something.

GroundItem item = new GroundItem(itemId, itemX, itemY, itemAmount, c.playerId, HIDE_TICKS, Server.playerHandler.players[playerId].playerName);
like that? would hide ticks be what controls the time for the item to respawn?\

wines of zamorak:
add wine object in spot.
if player clicks object it gives them wine
and customspawnsobject -1 in that spot
and then starts a timer that after a minute spawns the wine object there.

i wrote this a few minutes ago would this set up work?

Read full topic
